DOC.brief_title: Monitoring Early Follicular Phase With Androstenedione Low-dose Step-up Ovulation Induction High Responders
DOC.detailed_description: 50 patient anticipated high ovarian response , plan conventionally treat low-dose step-up ovulation induction intrauterine insemination analyse study . At every control day include start day , blood sample take blood estradiol ( require progesterone ) measurement use measure blood androstenedione total testosterone level , well . Hence , define early parameter define follicular response first 5-7 day low-dose step-up ovulation induction . Low-dose step-up ovulation induction start 50-75Units/day rhFSH dose increase early 7th day increment +37,5Units/day unless response observe ( least 10mm follicle , select growth ) . If 3 dominant follicle select , cycle cancel . Otherwise , least one follicle > 16mm obtain , 150Microgram sc . injection administer ovulation trigger intrauterine insemination make 34th-36th hour .
